verses.verse: Now these <WH428> are the people <WH1121> of the province <WH4082> who came <WH5927> up out of the captivity <WH7628> of the exiles <WH1473> whom <WH834> Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> had carried <WH1540> away <WH1540> to Babylon, <WH894> and returned <WH7725> to Jerusalem <WH3389> and Judah, <WH3063> each <WH376> to his city. <WH5892>

These <WH834> came <WH935> with Zerubbabel, <WH2216> Jeshua, <WH3091> Nehemiah, <WH5166> Seraiah, <WH8304> Reelaiah, <WH7480> Mordecai, <WH4782> Bilshan, <WH1114> Mispar, <WH4558> Bigvai, <WH902> Rehum, <WH7348> and Baanah. <WH1196> The number <WH4557> of the men <WH376> of the people <WH5971> of Israel: <WH3478>
the sons <WH1121> of Parosh, <WH6551> 2172;
the sons <WH1121> of Shephatiah, <WH8203> 372;
the sons <WH1121> of Arah, <WH733> 775;
the sons <WH1121> of Pahath-moab of the sons <WH1121> of Jeshua <WH3091> [and] Joab, <WH3097> 2812;
the sons <WH1121> of Elam, <WH9405> 1254;
the sons <WH1121> of Zattu, <WH2240> 945;
the sons <WH1121> of Zaccai, <WH2140> 760;
the sons <WH1121> of Bani, <WH1137> 642;
the sons <WH1121> of Bebai, <WH893> 623;
the sons <WH1121> of Azgad, <WH5803> 1222;
the sons <WH1121> of Adonikam, <WH140> 666;
the sons <WH1121> of Bigvai, <WH902> 2056;
the sons <WH1121> of Adin, <WH5720> 454;
the sons <WH1121> of Ater <WH333> of Hezekiah, <WH2396> 98;
the sons <WH1121> of Bezai, <WH1209> 323;
the sons <WH1121> of Jorah, <WH3139> 112;
the sons <WH1121> of Hashum, <WH2828> 223;
the sons <WH1121> of Gibbar, <WH1402> 95;
the men <WH1121> of Bethlehem, <WH1035> 123;
the men <WH376> of Netophah, <WH5199> 56;
the men <WH376> of Anathoth, <WH6068> 128;
the sons <WH1121> of Azmaveth, <WH9397> 42;
the sons <WH1121> of Kiriath-arim, Chephirah, <WH3716> and Beeroth, <WH881> 743;
the sons <WH1121> of Ramah <WH7414> and Geba, <WH1387> 621;
the men <WH376> of Michmas, <WH4363> 122;
the men <WH376> of Bethel <WH1008> and Ai, <WH5857> 223;
the sons <WH1121> of Nebo, <WH5015> 52, <WH2572>; <WH8147>
the sons <WH1121> of Magbish, <WH4019> 156;
the sons <WH1121> of the other <WH312> Elam, <WH9405> 1254;
the sons <WH1121> of Harim, <WH2766> 320;
the sons <WH1121> of Lod, <WH3850> Hadid, <WH2307> and Ono, <WH207> 725;
the men <WH1121> of Jericho, <WH3405> 345;
the sons <WH1121> of Senaah, <WH5570> 3630.
The priests: <WH3548> the sons <WH1121> of Jedaiah <WH3048> of the house <WH1004> of Jeshua, <WH3091> 973;
the sons <WH1121> of Immer, <WH564> 1052;
the sons <WH1121> of Pashhur, <WH6583> 1247;
the sons <WH1121> of Harim, <WH2766> 1017.
The Levites: <WH3881> the sons <WH1121> of Jeshua <WH3091> and Kadmiel, <WH6934> of the sons <WH1121> of Hodaviah, <WH1938> 74. <WH7657> <WH702>
The singers: <WH7891> the sons <WH1121> of Asaph, <WH623> 128.

The sons <WH1121> of the gatekeepers: <WH7778> the sons <WH1121> of Shallum, <WH7967> the sons <WH1121> of Ater, <WH333> the sons <WH1121> of Talmon, <WH2929> the sons <WH1121> of Akkub, <WH6126> the sons <WH1121> of Hatita, <WH2410> the sons <WH1121> of Shobai, <WH7630> in all <WH3605> 139.
The temple <WH5411> servants: <WH5411> the sons <WH1121> of Ziha, <WH6727> the sons <WH1121> of Hasupha, <WH2817> the sons <WH1121> of Tabbaoth, <WH2884>
the sons <WH1121> of Keros, <WH7026> the sons <WH1121> of Siaha, <WH5517> the sons <WH1121> of Padon, <WH6303>
the sons <WH1121> of Lebanah, <WH3838> the sons <WH1121> of Hagabah, <WH9117> the sons <WH1121> of Akkub, <WH6126>
the sons <WH1121> of Hagab, <WH2285> the sons <WH1121> of Shalmai, <WH8014> the sons <WH1121> of Hanan, <WH2605>
the sons <WH1121> of Giddel, <WH1435> the sons <WH1121> of Gahar, <WH1515> the sons <WH1121> of Reaiah, <WH7211>
the sons <WH1121> of Rezin, <WH7526> the sons <WH1121> of Nekoda, <WH5353> the sons <WH1121> of Gazzam, <WH1502>
the sons <WH1121> of Uzza, <WH5798> the sons <WH1121> of Paseah, <WH6454> the sons <WH1121> of Besai, <WH1153>
the sons <WH1121> of Asnah, <WH619> the sons <WH1121> of Meunim, <WH4586> the sons <WH1121> of Nephisim, <WH5304>
the sons <WH1121> of Bakbuk, <WH1227> the sons <WH1121> of Hakupha, <WH2709> the sons <WH1121> of Harhur, <WH2744>
the sons <WH1121> of Bazluth, <WH1213> the sons <WH1121> of Mehida, <WH4240> the sons <WH1121> of Harsha, <WH2797>
the sons <WH1121> of Barkos, <WH1302> the sons <WH1121> of Sisera, <WH5516> the sons <WH1121> of Temah, <WH8547>
the sons <WH1121> of Neziah, <WH5335> the sons <WH1121> of Hatipha. <WH2412>
The sons <WH1121> of Solomon's servants: <WH5650> the sons <WH1121> of Sotai, <WH5479> the sons <WH1121> of Hassophereth, <WH5618> the sons <WH1121> of Peruda, <WH6514>
the sons <WH1121> of Jaalah, <WH3279> the sons <WH1121> of Darkon, <WH1874> the sons <WH1121> of Giddel, <WH1435>
the sons <WH1121> of Shephatiah, <WH8203> the sons <WH1121> of Hattil, <WH2411> the sons <WH1121> of Pochereth-hazzebaim, the sons <WH1121> of Ami. <WH532>
All <WH3605> the temple <WH5411> servants, <WH5411> and the sons <WH1121> of Solomon's servants, <WH5650> were 392.

Now these <WH428> are those who came <WH5927> up from Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, Cherub, <WH3743> Addan, <WH135> [and] Immer, <WH564> but they were not able <WH3201> to give <WH5046> evidence <WH5046> of their fathers' households, <WH1004> and their descendants, <WH2233> whether <WH518> they were of Israel: <WH3478>
the sons <WH1121> of Delaiah, <WH1806> the sons <WH1121> of Tobiah, <WH2900> the sons <WH1121> of Nekoda, <WH5353> 652.

And of the sons <WH1121> of the priests: <WH3548> the sons <WH1121> of Habaiah, <WH2252> the sons <WH1121> of Hakkoz, <WH6976> the sons <WH1121> of Barzillai, <WH1271> who <WH834> took <WH3947> a wife <WH802> from the daughters <WH1323> of Barzillai <WH1271> the Gileadite, <WH1569> and he was called <WH7121> by their name. <WH8034>

These <WH428> searched <WH1245> [among] their ancestral <WH3187> registration, <WH3791> <WH3187> but they could not be located; <WH4672> therefore they were considered unclean <WH1351> [and excluded] from the priesthood. <WH3550>

And the governor <WH8660> said <WH559> to them that they should not eat <WH398> from the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> things <WH6944> until <WH5704> a priest <WH3548> stood <WH5975> up with Urim <WH224> and Thummim. <WH8550>
The whole <WH3605> assembly <WH6951> numbered <WH259> 42360,
besides <WH4480> <WH905> their male <WH5650> and female <WH519> servants, <WH5650> <WH519> who <WH428> numbered 7337; and they had 200 singing <WH7891> men and women.
Their horses <WH5483> were 736; their mules, <WH6505> 245;
their camels, <WH1581> 435; [their] donkeys, <WH2543> 6720.

And some <WH4480> of the heads <WH7218> of fathers' [households,] when they arrived <WH935> at the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> which <WH834> is in Jerusalem, <WH3389> offered <WH5068> willingly <WH5068> for the house <WH1004> of God <WH430> to restore <WH5975> it on its foundation. <WH4349>

According to their ability <WH3581> they gave <WH5414> to the treasury <WH214> for the work <WH4399> 61000 gold <WH2091> drachmas, <WH1871> and 5000 silver <WH3701> minas, <WH4488> and 100 priestly <WH3548> garments. <WH3801>

Now the priests <WH3548> and the Levites, <WH3881> some <WH4480> of the people, <WH5971> the singers, <WH7891> the gatekeepers, <WH7778> and the temple <WH5411> servants <WH5411> lived <WH3427> in their cities, <WH5892> and all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> in their cities. <WH5892>
